name: SpecifyNothing
description: The specification is not done intentionally. Programmers are expected to work better without written specifications.

threshold.thresholdPrintName: Minimum number of wiki pages with project specification
threshold.thresholdErrorMess: Minimum number of wikipages must be positive integer number

threshold.thresholdPrintName: Minimum number of activities with project specification
threshold.thresholdErrorMess: Minimum number of activities with project specification must be positive integer number

threshold.thresholdPrintName: Minimum average length of activity description
threshold.thresholdDescription: Minimum average number of character of activity description
threshold.thresholdErrorMess: Minimum average length of activity description must be positive integer number

threshold.thresholdDescription: Substring that will be search in wikipages and activities
threshold.thresholdErrorMess: Maximum number of substrings is ten and must not starts and ends with characters ||
